definition[0]: a round container attached to the wall in a bathroom, where you wash your hands and face
definition[1]: a large bowl-shaped container for liquids or food
example[1]: Fill the basin with the cake mixture.
definition[2]: the amount of liquid that a basin can contain
definition[3]: an area of land that is lower at the centre than at the edges, especially one from which water runs down into a river
definition[4]: a place where the Earthâ€™s surface is lower than in other areas
